definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: With the completion of a thermal power plant and a gas works in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 另有一座热电厂和煤气厂也即将先后建成。

sentences.english: Thermoficated generating ratio is a important concept for the coal saving calculation of electricity generation in cogeneration power plant.
sentences.chinese: 热化发电比是热电厂发电节煤量的一个重要概念。

sentences.english: The problem of the heat power house pipe encrustation filthiness influences the normal running of dynamotors seriously.
sentences.chinese: 热电厂输灰管道结垢问题影响发电机组的正常运行。

sentences.english: In 1984 it became one of the biggest thermal electric power stations in the USSR.
sentences.chinese: 在1984年成为苏联最大的热电厂之一。

sentences.english: Fuel cells offer several advantages over traditional thermal power plants.
sentences.chinese: 与传统的热电厂相比，燃料电池有种种优势。

sentences.english: The accessory projects of outside heat supply network for Gaobeidian Cogeneration Plant and other heat-supply networks will be completed.
sentences.chinese: 完成高碑店热电厂外网配套工程以及其他管网工程。

sentences.english: The quality of the water power plant is directly related to whether the safe operation of thermal equipment.
sentences.chinese: 热电厂的水质质量直接关系到热力设备能否安全运行。

definition: fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)
